title: La Trobe University Competitive Online Games Society (LTU COGS)
body:
Hello, Summoners!

LTU COGS will be competing in the upcoming OUC, and we're always looking for more League fans to join us.

If you are a student from LTU and are looking to join a team, feel free to make a post here or join our [Facebook group](https://www.facebook.com/groups/LTUCOGS)!

replies.body: hey are you guys looking for players?

Hey Yamanite,

We are definitely looking for players to join us and play in the OUC. If you haven't already, you can join our Facebook group [here](https://www.facebook.com/groups/LTUCOGS). We will be posting updates about the OUC there, and you can even play a casual game or two with other members as well.
